instructions.name: closeCargoPod
docs: Closes the [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod) if it has no open token accounts.

accounts.name: funder
docs: The account to return the rent

accounts.name: authority

instructions.name: closeTokenAccount
docs: Closes and burns any excess tokens in a given token account within a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod).

accounts.name: funder
docs: The account to return the rent

accounts.name: cargoType
docs: If the token account belongs to a registered Cargo Type then this account must be a valid Cargo Type
However, to allow closing token account that are not valid Cargo this is an unchecked account

instructions.name: consumeCargo
docs: Consumes cargo from a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod), burning the amount.

instructions.name: legitimizeCargo
docs: Legitimizes cargo in a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod) that was added outside of [`add_cargo`] or other cargo ix.

docs: Removes cargo from a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod) to a given token account.

instructions.name: updateCargoPod
docs: Updates a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod) account to have the newest sequence id from the [`CargoDefinition`](state::CargoStatsDefinition).
This is the first step to update a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod) to a new [`CargoStatsDefinition`](state::CargoStatsDefinition).

instructions.name: updateDefinition
docs: Will advance the `seq_id` unless `rollback` is set to true.

accounts.name: key
docs: The key authorized for this instruction

accounts.name: profile
docs: Is going to act as the authority for the new definition.

instructions.name: updatePodTokenAccount
docs: Updates a [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod)'s token account to have the same sequence id as the [`CargoPod`](state::CargoPod).

instructions.name: updateTokenAccountForInvalidType
docs: Removes a pod's token account if it no longer has a cargo type by burning all the invalid cargo.
